title.narrative: Programme for cleantech innovation and green jobs Phase 2

description.narrative: The Ministry in charge of Environment requested UNIDO to design the second phase of the National Cleantech programme for Morocco. The programme will specifically focus on expanding the national approach and develop regional innovation clusters around the local industry. The project will include the annual national cleantech competition complemented by regionally hosted competitions. It is expected that the additionality of a regional approach will allow working with local institutions to actively create more opportunities for youth employment around different industrial zones in Morocco.
